function: Allow users to submit new questions with a title and content.
static_description: A form with two input fields: one for the question title and a larger text area for the question content. Both fields use placeholders from resource dependencies. Submit button styled with saddle brown background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the submit button sends the form data via POST request to the backend API endpoint.

resource_dependency.questionDataSchema: Table 'questions' with columns: id (UUID), title (string), content_excerpt (string), created_at (timestamp)

function: Display a list of submitted questions with their titles and content excerpts.
static_description: A vertically stacked list of cards showing each question's title and excerpt. Background set to beige, card borders styled with saddle brown.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a question card navigates to the detailed question page for that question.

resource_dependency.questionDataSchema: Table 'questions' with columns: id (UUID), title (string), content (text), created_at (timestamp)
resource_dependency.answerDataSchema: Table 'answers' with columns: id (UUID), question_id (foreign key), content (text), rating (integer), created_at (timestamp)

function: Show the full content of a selected question along with all associated answers.
static_description: Top section displays the complete question title and content. Below it, a section lists all answers related to this question. Background is beige with saddle brown accents on headers.

function: Provide an interface for submitting answers to a specific question.
static_description: Located below the question details, includes a text area with placeholder text and a submit button styled in saddle brown.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the submit button posts the answer content to the backend API for the current question.

resource_dependency.answerDataSchema: Table 'answers' with columns: id (UUID), question_id (foreign key), content (text), rating (integer), created_at (timestamp)

function: Render all submitted answers beneath their corresponding question.
static_description: Each answer appears in a separate card with its content and current rating displayed. Cards have beige background with saddle brown borders.

function: Enable users to vote on the helpfulness of answers through upvotes/downvotes.
static_description: Each answer shows two directional buttons (up/down arrows) next to the current rating count. Buttons are colored saddle brown.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking either arrow sends a PATCH request to update the rating value in the database.

function: Update answer ratings dynamically without requiring a page reload.
static_description: Ratings appear as numerical counts adjacent to voting controls. No visible changes during idle state.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon receiving a 'answer_rated' event over WebSocket, the relevant answer’s rating count updates immediately.
